title: Land with house
details:
12 Perches Land for Sale in Kandy for Rs 17 Million (ONO)

To Sri Dalada Maligawa (temple of tooth) - 2.8 km..
To Kandy town - 4 km..
To Kandy general hospital - 5.4 km..
To Dharmaraja college - 2.1 km..
To Mahamaya girl's college -3.1 km..
To Trinity college -3.1km..
To St. Sylvester's college -3.3 km..
To Vidyartha college -2.3 km.....

easy access to Kandy town, Kandy General hospital, Kandy City Center, Kandy railway station, and easy access to Polgolla sea plane deck
